comments.comment: This review is for the men out there who are looking for buying the shoes. Let me tell you one thing that this is not for men. This shoe is unisex but it does not fit well at all for men. My size is 9 and these are very uncomfortable to my feet. The insole is really good but the fit of my feet is very uncomfortable so if you're looking to buy this for a woman then go for it. Otherwise, it does not look good in your feet. This is an review from my side and your side might differ. So all the best for me. I wouldn't recommend this product. And myntra please make the packaging better. The worst packaging comes from only your side.

I recently purchased a pair of Puma white sneakers, and I am thoroughly impressed. The design is sleek and modern, making them versatile enough to pair with both casual and semi-formal outfits. The comfort level is outstanding, with cushioning that supports my feet even during long walks. The build quality is also notable; they feel durable and well-made, which is essential for everyday wear. Additionally, they are easy to clean, maintaining their fresh look effortlessly. Overall, these Puma white sneakers are a fantastic addition to anyone's wardrobe, combining style, comfort, and durability.
😍😍😍😍😎😎😎

Basically the shoe quality is so good hard to smash but the only problem is the shoe lace holes were not good they are so tight but if the fit perfect then the shoes will be so good for us to use and if your shoe size is for suppose UK 4 you need to order the shoe number UK 6 because my foot length is 9 inches which is the UK 4 but coming to shoe we should literally order more than double size because we should keep our leg inside the shoes so it should be so easy enough to Move it inside so I hope you guys understood what I am telling and thank you the oral shoe rating I can give is 4.5 out of 5 that .5 is reduced because of only the shoe less holes which are not easy to remove the shoelace from the shoe and thank you.

The Puma Smashic Brand Logo Printed Casual Sneakers are a stylish and comfortable choice for everyday wear. Featuring a sleek design with the iconic Puma logo, these sneakers offer a trendy, sporty look. The cushioned insole and padded collar provide excellent comfort and support for prolonged use. The durable rubber outsole ensures reliable traction on various surfaces. Lightweight and versatile, these sneakers are perfect for casual outings, adding a touch of athletic flair to any outfit. Overall, the Puma Smashic sneakers combine fashion and function, making them a great addition to any wardrobe.

This puma white sneakers is the best with this price

Puma logo looks nice
The only problem is if you have broad feet then you might feel uncomfortable wearing these shoes
I loved this shoes perfect fit for me

comments.comment:
From the moment I slipped these sneakers on, I was impressed by how comfortable they felt. The cushioned insole provides excellent support, making them ideal for long days on my feet.
 These sneakers strike the perfect balance between casual and stylish. The black canvas upper gives them a sleek and versatile look that pairs well with a variety of outfits, from jeans to shorts.
Durability: Despite their lightweight feel, these sneakers are built to last. The sturdy construction and quality materials give me confidence that they'll withstand regular wear and tear.
 Whether I'm running errands around town or meeting up with friends for a casual outing, these sneakers are the perfect choice. They offer the right mix of style and functionality for any occasion.
Overall, I highly recommend the US Polo Assn Men Black Canvas Sneakers to anyone in search of comfortable, stylish footwear. They're a great addition to any wardrobe and offer unbeatable value for the price.

Comfortable: 
The shoe is extremely comfortable to wear, with soft cushioning and a supportive insole.
Stylish: 
The design is sleek and stylish, perfect for both casual and dressy occasions.
Durable: 
The shoe is well-made, with high-quality materials and sturdy construction.
Versatile: 
Can be worn with jeans, trousers

*Cons:
- lNot ideal for heavy use: While the shoe is comfortable, it may not be suitable for heavy use or intense activities.

Overall:
I'm extremely happy with my purchase! The shoe is perfect for everyday wear, and I've received numerous compliments on its stylish design. I would highly recommend this shoe to anyone looking for a comfortable and fashionable addition to their wardrobe.

Recommendation:
If you're looking for a reliable and stylish shoe, I would definitely recommend giving this one a try. Just be aware of the sizing issues and consider ordering a half-size up. Happy shopping on Myntra!

Quality of shoes is good at this price , its canvas material hard to clean , u can wear these shoes at occasions only, these are not for daily use ,go for synthetic leather shoes for daily use. I ordered size uk 7 and it's comfortable to me in other brands i use uk 8 size , i will recommend that buy smaller size by 1 unit .. overall shoes are good not that much wow product but basically at this price and u.s polo it's worth... packaging was poor anyways at myantra it was good deal..😀

If you are looking for shoe without opening the laces regularly then you should not go for it .  I personally am a huge fan of US POLO . But let me explain even  after giving 5 out of 5 why I am not so much fond of this product .  

The most important role of a pair shoes is to provide comfort .  This particular pair of shoes fails in that department slightly . We are not genetically manufactured to have exact 6 or 7 . So if being 6.5 , I am not entitled to have  a pair of comfortable shoes , then entire blame goes to the design .      

Otherwise US Polo is as good as anyone would expect .

I got this shoe very recently during the last sale. The fit is nice and so is the colour scheme. The shoe is extremely sleek. The only drawback about this shoe is it seems to be leather kind of material(don't exactly know what it's called) in the pictures posted here but it is actually converse. And since it's a white shoe, it is very difficult to clean it in case it gets mud on it(unfortunately wore it on a day when it rained) since it also comes with a warning that you're not supposed to wash it. Hope this is helpful for y'all!

Very good quality shoes with classy looks. The material is kinda like cloth fabric. The sole isn't thick, which makes it classy. But it will get dirty quite easily, and getting the right size was quite challenging for me as the difference between Size 8 and size 9 was a bit high ( about 1.7 cm). According to my foot (28 cm) , something between size 8 and 9 would have fitted me perfectly. Size 9 was a bit loose for me, and size 8 fits me a bit loose . After a few hours of usage, it hurts my foot. Getting the right size would make it a nice deal. Just get 0.5 cm more length than your actual foot length.

comments.comment: I am thoroughly impressed with their quality and style. Firstly, I was amazed by the quick delivery – the shoes arrived at my doorstep in just three days, which is fantastic service.The shoes are exceptionally comfortable, with a cushioned insole that provides excellent support for all-day wear. The design is classic yet modern, making them versatile enough to pair with both casual and semi-formal outfits.The craftsmanship is top-notch, with sturdy stitching and high-quality materials that speak to the durability of the shoes. I've worn them daily for the past few weeks, and they've held up remarkably well without any signs of wear and tear. The fit is true to size, and the shoes required no breaking in, which is a huge plus.Additionally, I received numerous compliments on the sleek look of these shoes. The U.S. Polo Assn. logo adds a touch of sophistication without being too flashy. The shoes also provide good traction, making them suitable for various surfaces.

Comfort: These shoes are incredibly comfortable. They have excellent padding and support, making them ideal for all-day wear. Whether I’m walking, standing, or running errands, my feet feel great.

The design is stylish and versatile. The classic U.S. Polo Assn. look is both fashionable and timeless, making them suitable for various occasions, from casual outings to more formal settings.

The quality of these shoes is top-notch. They are made with durable materials that can withstand regular use. Despite wearing them frequently, they still look and feel like new.

I am thoroughly impressed! These shoes combine style with exceptional comfort, making them perfect for both casual wear and light exercise. The breathable mesh material keeps my feet cool, and the cushioned insoles provide excellent support throughout the day. The sleek design and variety of colors also make them versatile enough to pair with any outfit. Whether I'm running errands or going for a walk, these sneakers have quickly become my go-to choice. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a stylish yet comfortable shoe option!
Amazing kicks for sporty stuff and if you wanna pair em up with well fitted denims or trousers or shorts but not for baggy denims.

The shoe is eye tempting, scintillating at the same time attractive below is my detail insight: (Comparing with Premium Puma shoe)

1. Built: The built quality is good, but the materials need a boost, especially the tip adhesion.
2. Comfort: The shoe is not too bad not too good in comfort, the insole is but the sides on the inner wall needs a little spread, my foot is on the slimmer side but still it seems it needed half an inch to feel comfortable.
3. Durability: The shoe is a mix of semi anti slip so the materials can be damage if no proper care is given. The leathers are prone to sharp objects or stumbling stones and sticks, but not that delicate.

Overall 7/10 because of the comfort level.

Now here comes the new product I received. It was totally and completely different from what I have ordered, as I received a women's shoes. What is wrong? I feel being cheated. OMG! I WANT A REFUND.

The Red Tape white casual shoes with red color accents are a stylish addition to any wardrobe. Crafted from high-quality materials, they offer a comfortable and snug fit. The combination of white and red adds a trendy and vibrant touch, making them perfect for casual outings or everyday wear. The soles provide excellent grip, ensuring stability on various surfaces. However, the shoes might require a bit of breaking in for optimal comfort. The build quality is impressive, promising durability and long-lasting use. Overall, these shoes are a great blend of style, comfort, and value, perfect for those looking to elevate their casual look.

comments.comment: I am thoroughly impressed with their quality and style. Firstly, I was amazed by the quick delivery – the shoes arrived at my doorstep in just three days, which is fantastic service.The shoes are exceptionally comfortable, with a cushioned insole that provides excellent support for all-day wear. The design is classic yet modern, making them versatile enough to pair with both casual and semi-formal outfits.The craftsmanship is top-notch, with sturdy stitching and high-quality materials that speak to the durability of the shoes. I've worn them daily for the past few weeks, and they've held up remarkably well without any signs of wear and tear. The fit is true to size, and the shoes required no breaking in, which is a huge plus.Additionally, I received numerous compliments on the sleek look of these shoes. The U.S. Polo Assn. logo adds a touch of sophistication without being too flashy. The shoes also provide good traction, making them suitable for various surfaces.

Comfort: These shoes are incredibly comfortable. They have excellent padding and support, making them ideal for all-day wear. Whether I’m walking, standing, or running errands, my feet feel great.

The design is stylish and versatile. The classic U.S. Polo Assn. look is both fashionable and timeless, making them suitable for various occasions, from casual outings to more formal settings.

The quality of these shoes is top-notch. They are made with durable materials that can withstand regular use. Despite wearing them frequently, they still look and feel like new.

I liked the price and design of the shoe. Quality was ok for the price. I am not sure if the sole will be always sticked to the shoe. But it's not bad. I will use it for some more time and will inform you. I mainly use for walking daily 5km and for going outside. I will write a used review after some time.
Excellent product. Comfortable. In sole is little bit hard. No soft cushion inside. Apart from that everything is fine. Shoe color is as per the Myntra image.

Shoe looks promising and let me tell you its not PU its synthetic leather...

Only thing i didn't like is the cushioning...

So you may expect thin line on front part of the shoe when you bend the shoe in front side

As well as the synthetic leather will come out if rain or water hits on it as well as after few days it will come out...

But still it looks stylish and i feel good

comments.comment: Basically the shoe quality is so good hard to smash but the only problem is the shoe lace holes were not good they are so tight but if the fit perfect then the shoes will be so good for us to use and if your shoe size is for suppose UK 4 you need to order the shoe number UK 6 because my foot length is 9 inches which is the UK 4 but coming to shoe we should literally order more than double size because we should keep our leg inside the shoes so it should be so easy enough to Move it inside so I hope you guys understood what I am telling and thank you the oral shoe rating I can give is 4.5 out of 5 that .5 is reduced because of only the shoe less holes which are not easy to remove the shoelace from the shoe and thank you.

The Puma Smashic Brand Logo Printed Casual Sneakers are a stylish and comfortable choice for everyday wear. Featuring a sleek design with the iconic Puma logo, these sneakers offer a trendy, sporty look. The cushioned insole and padded collar provide excellent comfort and support for prolonged use. The durable rubber outsole ensures reliable traction on various surfaces. Lightweight and versatile, these sneakers are perfect for casual outings, adding a touch of athletic flair to any outfit. Overall, the Puma Smashic sneakers combine fashion and function, making them a great addition to any wardrobe.

This puma white sneakers is the best with this price 
Nice white sneakers, it's very comfortable,
Puma logo looks nice
The only problem is if you have broad feet then you might feel uncomfortable wearing these shoes
I loved this shoes perfect fit for me

This review is for the men out there who are looking for buying the shoes. Let me tell you one thing that this is not for men. This shoe is unisex but it does not fit well at all for men. My size is 9 and these are very uncomfortable to my feet. The insole is really good but the fit of my feet is very uncomfortable so if you're looking to buy this for a woman then go for it. Otherwise, it does not look good in your feet. This is an review from my side and your side might differ. So all the best for me. I wouldn't recommend this product. And myntra please make the packaging better. The worst packaging comes from only your side.

I recently purchased a pair of Puma white sneakers, and I am thoroughly impressed. The design is sleek and modern, making them versatile enough to pair with both casual and semi-formal outfits. The comfort level is outstanding, with cushioning that supports my feet even during long walks. The build quality is also notable; they feel durable and well-made, which is essential for everyday wear. Additionally, they are easy to clean, maintaining their fresh look effortlessly. Overall, these Puma white sneakers are a fantastic addition to anyone's wardrobe, combining style, comfort, and durability.
😍😍😍😍😎😎😎
